thread.title: Jean Machine reviewed by Angeline Navarra
thread.title_full: Jean Machine reviewed by Angeline Navarra

author: Angeline Navarra
title: Jean Machine reviewed by Angeline Navarra
text:
My friend and I were recently in the Newmarket/Upper Canada Mall store and were treated as though their only job to make us happy and find the best fit for us. Olivia and the other staff member (sorry, can't remember your name)....went above and beyond in making this one of the best shopping experiences ever. It is apparent that they love the work they do and we will make that our first stop when purchasing our next pair of jeans.
These ambassadors for Jean Machine deserve a raise :-)
